articles.title: James Jordan tells wife Ola 'to put some clothes on' as she does housework in lingerie - The Mirror
articles.description: Ola Jordan confidently enters her kitchen in a red underwear set and cheekily tells husband James she's ready for guests, following her rapid three stone weight loss
articles.content:
Strictly star Ola Jordan struts her stuff in red underwear while tidying the kitchen after her 3.5 stone weight loss, as her husband James joke "you've got to start putting clothes on babe."

articles.title: Ginny And Georgia Mental Health Story Is Authentic - BuzzFeed
articles.description: In order to realistically depict mental health on TV, the team behind Ginny & Georgia worked closely with a psychologist and Mental Health America.
